text: War and Remembrance is an American mini-series based on the 1978 novel of the same name by Herman Wouk and aired from 13 November, 1988 to 14 May, 1989. It is the sequel to the 1983 mini-series The Winds of War also based on the novel by Herman Wouk and won a slew on awards in 1989. ==Other websites== * * * War and Remembrance television film trailer at YouTube Category:1988 American television series debuts Category:1989 American television series endings Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Dan Curtis
title: War and Remembrance (miniseries)
